rules_text:
Reach
When Primordial Artisan enters the battlefield, search your library for any number of green creature cards with total mana value equal to or less than your devotion to green, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle. [i](Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)[/i]
notes:
RDZ
Kekai Kotaki hill giant
Mateusz Ozminski alt
